title: Champion Insights: Ivern, the Really Swell Guy

replies.body: Isn't {{champion:201}} the nicest champion?
but he punches innocent jungle monsters. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I like to think that Braum is Ivern's long lost Grandchild. He just hasn't learned from pops how to set the forest free yet!
yeah everyone does but {{champion:32}} head bash's them whereas Ivern just takes their soul or something.
Nah, he just tells them to run away. Be free.
{{champion:201}} Likes to fight Ivern doesn't I think that's the difrence
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 2 million years later ivern still hasn't been released
nice chamion btw how do i get a pbe account? or u cant get anymore pbe accounts?
You need a lvl 30 NA account and then you go here, https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe
Wait can u get a Pbe account if u r on Oce
nope, NA or EUW accounts only (certainly NA, pretty sure about EUW but not certain)
you can always level up one. Or fuck, buy one.
Sorry for the necro reply, but do you know if you have to be active on that account to get PBE access, and if so, how active is active?
when will he be released {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
4 days from now
ty for the Information keep up the good work{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I'm stupidly keen for Ivern! Yay!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} Leave a comment
Teemo's nice to you know {{champion:17}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
he look kinda well fat in the trailer but in the picture well hes not fat :|
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EbqaxWjIgOg Enough said.
i think it would be better if he had a mask cause dam he has a huge nose{{champion:121}}
